claim: The proportion of French-language cards within the Story Spotlight set is 25%.
extra_info: Story Spotlight card refers to isStorySpotlight = 1; French is the language; Percentage = Divide(Count(id) where language = 'French' and isStorySpotlight = 1, Count(id) where isStorySpotlight = 1)*100
reasoning: The database shows 87 French-language entries out of 870 total foreign_data entries for Story Spotlight cards (isStorySpotlight = 1), giving a proportion of 10%, not 25% as claimed.

content.text: I'll verify this claim step by step. Let me first explore the database schema and then run the appropriate queries.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,
    colorIndicator          TEXT,
    colors                  TEXT,
    convertedManaCost       REAL,
    duelDeck                TEXT,
    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);

content.text: I can see the `cards` table has `isStorySpotlight` column. Now I need to check if there's a `language` column. It's not in `cards`, so let me check `foreign_data` and `set_translations`.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "set_translations"
(
    id          INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    language    TEXT,
    setCode     TEXT
        references sets (code)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
    translation TEXT
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "set_translations"
(
    id          INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    language    TEXT,
    setCode     TEXT
        references sets (code)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
    translation TEXT
);

content.text: The `foreign_data` table has a `language` column and links to `cards` via `uuid`. Now let me run the query to compute the proportion.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM foreign_data f JOIN cards c ON f.uuid = c.uuid WHERE c.isStorySpotlight = 1;"
input.description: Count total foreign_data entries for Story Spotlight cards

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM foreign_data f JOIN cards c ON f.uuid = c.uuid WHERE c.isStorySpotlight = 1 AND f.language = 'French';"
input.description: Count French foreign_data entries for Story Spotlight cards

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN f.language = 'French' THEN f.id END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(f.id) FROM foreign_data f JOIN cards c ON f.uuid = c.uuid WHERE c.isStorySpotlight = 1;"
input.description: Calculate percentage of French cards in Story Spotlight

content.text: The percentage is 10%, not 25%. Let me also check using the hint's exact formula (counting by `id` from `foreign_data`):

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT language, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM foreign_data f JOIN cards c ON f.uuid = c.uuid WHERE c.isStorySpotlight = 1 GROUP BY language ORDER BY cnt DESC;"
input.description: Breakdown of languages for Story Spotlight cards

content.text:
There are 10 languages, each with 87 entries. So French represents 87/870 = 10% of the foreign-language Story Spotlight cards, not 25%.

The claim states 25%, but the data shows 10%.

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The database shows 87 French-language entries out of 870 total foreign_data entries for Story Spotlight cards (isStorySpotlight = 1), giving a proportion of 10%, not 25% as claimed."}
```
